name: Team Building Exercise
description:
You control characters Mike and Jamie. Mike is big and strong, Jamie is small, yet smart. Together you have been challenged for a Team Building Exercise. You have to work together to overcome obstacles and reach the other side of the warehouse. 

This is a puzzle game. You have to think and move boxes.  There are 4 Levels and a timer for fun. 

Also this is my first finished and posted game. It is buggy and unattractive, but it's done. :) Any feedback is welcomed and most appreciated. 

The controls are: 

WASD, or Arrows - movement

Space - Jump

E - to switch between characters

Q - to command the other guy to stay put and again to call. 

Best use both E and Q straight away to avoid character getting stuck somewhere.

R - to restart the level
